references: M. Le, On Smarandache Concatenated Sequences II: Factorial Sequence, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 9, No. 1-2, 1998, 131-132.
formula: a(n)=a(n-1)*10^floor[1+log10(n!)]+n!, with a(1)=1 - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jul 04 2008
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,n; a:=1; print(1); for n from 2 by 1 to i do a:=a*10^floor(evalf(1+log10(n!),1000))+n!; print(a); od; end: P(50); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jul 04 2008
mathematica: nn=20;With[{f=Range[nn]!},Table[FromDigits[Flatten[ IntegerDigits/@ Take[ f,n]]],{n,nn}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 27 2015 *)
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 27 2015
